message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a competitive price, considering its worth $8,000 to you. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to me is $10,000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer it to you for $10,800. This is a reasonable compromise, considering the product's value to me is $10,000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your willingness to make adjustments, but $10,800 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again and offer $10,400. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,400. I'm willing to make another slight adjustment and offer it to you for $10,600. This is a reasonable compromise, considering the product's value to me is $10,000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your continued willingness to make adjustments, but $10,600 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $10,200, but that's as low as I can go. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,200. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer it to you for $10,500. This is a final compromise, considering the product's value to me is $10,000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your final compromise, but I'm afraid I need to be more aggressive in my offer. I'm willing to meet you at $9,800, but that's as high as I can go. If I don't get a better price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $8,000.
